mapper.update: update member_store_info set status=2 where deleted = 0 and status!=2 and expire_time is not null and expire_time< now()
mapper.select: select concat('充值', pay_money, '元,赠送', gift_money, '元！') from member_discount_rules where deleted = 0 and store_id = #{store_id} and status = 1 and exprice_time > now() order by pay_money asc
select count(1) from member_room_info where deleted = 0 and store_id = #{store_id} and status = 1
select create_time AS subscribeTime from member_order_info where deleted = 0 and store_id = #{store_id} and status != 3 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
select distinct city_name from member_store_info where deleted = 0 and status = 0 order by create_time asc

select s.store_id,s.store_name,s.city_name,s.head_img,s.lat,s.lon,s.address,s.status,s.kefu_phone,
( 6371 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{reqVO.lat})) * COS(RADIANS(lat)) * COS(RADIANS(lon) - RADIANS(#{reqVO.lon})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{reqVO.lat})) * SIN(RADIANS(lat)) ) ) AS distance
9999 AS distance
from member_store_info s
s.deleted=0 and s.status=0
and s.city_name=#{reqVO.cityName}
and locate(#{reqVO.name},s.store_name)>0
and s.store_id IN ( select DISTINCT store_id from member_order_info where deleted=0 and user_id=#{userId} )
order by distance asc

select s.store_name `key`,s.store_id `value` from member_store_info s left join member_store_user su ON su.store_id=s.store_id and su.type!=11 where s.deleted = 0 and su.deleted=0 and su.user_id=#{userId}
and locate(#{cityName},s.city_name)>0
and locate(#{name},s.store_name)>0
order by s.store_id asc

select s.store_name `key`,s.store_id `value` from member_store_info s where s.deleted = 0 and s.status = 0
and locate(#{cityName},s.city_name)>0
and locate(#{name},s.store_name)>0
order by s.store_id asc

select r.*, s.tx_start_hour, s.tx_hour, s.work_price enableWorkPrice, s.clear_time clearTime from member_room_info r left join member_store_info s ON r.store_id=s.store_id where r.deleted = 0 and r.room_id = #{roomId}

select store_id as 'key', store_name as 'value' from member_store_info where deleted = 0 and store_id in
#{item}

select * from member_store_info where deleted = 0 and store_id in
#{item}
select store_name from member_store_info where deleted = 0 and store_id = #{storeId}
select douyin_poi_id from member_store_info where deleted = 0 and store_id = #{storeId}
